page.title: 12 Occupations In Barham.
page.content: Our School did a survey on occupations. We had 57 replies,and out of these only 9 worked within the survey area. Most of these have a farming job.Others include a picture framer and restorer who works at home.Another works at Broome Park.He looks after the putting and bowling greens.Out of those who don't work in our survey area about one third work in Canterbury,and others work within a twenty mile radius.The nearest works in Kingston and the farthest in the Middle East.He often travels 8,000 miles by plane.46 use a car and only 4 walk.2 cycle and one goes by motor bike.Unusual jobs include gardening,telephone engineer,and a wine despatcher.Here are some types of jobs :10 farming,3 industry,7 commerce,5 clerical,5 transport and 9 education.These comprise 8 teachers and 1 lecturer.
